He's smart, he's good looking, and he's got a great sense of humor. He's Dexter Morgan, everyone's favorite serial killer. As a Miami forensics expert, he spends his days solving crimes, and nights committing them. But Dexter lives by a strict code of honor that is both his saving grace and lifelong burden. Torn between his deadly compulsion and his desire for true happiness, Dexter is a man in profound conflict with the world and himself. 9.2 <<<<<<< HEAD 1449 ======= 1392 >>>>>>> 63a2c908009d8c5b86301c78fa0d8daee9faabf7 60 62683 Dexter Ended
